channel.title: Uberlution [PI Base]
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=6][COLOR=#a52a2a]Uber[COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR]lution[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a] About Uberlution;[/COLOR][/B][/I] [COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520]Uberlution is a PI based server. At the moment the server is practically empty with just a little content around the home area. Uberlution plans on having a great economy, a superb community and plenty of fun content to enjoy! I decided to create Uberlution because I have always been interesting in learning to get deep into coding and own a community where everyone can enjoy a superb server and feel welcomed.[/COLOR] [SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520]The exp rates will be a little challenging, nothing what is going to take weeks of work to get a 99 though, the exp rate for combat is 10x RS, 40 exp per 1 damage.[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a]Server Update Log;[/COLOR][/B][/I] [SIZE=1][URL=http://"http://uberlution.co.uk/forums/viewthread.php?forum=3&id=36"](Also click here)[/URL][/SIZE] [COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520][SIZE=2][spoiler] - Home Island created [img]http://i.imgur.com/TnRhdkd.png[/img]
- Shops for home added; -- Sigmunt the Merchant ( Island's General Store ) -- Zeke: Melee Shop ( Low level Weapons & Armours ) -- Salesman: Range n Mage ( Low level Bows, Arrows, Runes and Robes ) -- Bob: Skilling Store ( General skilling supplies and low level herblore ) -- Points Merchant ( PvP store & Uber store )
- NPC's added for home; -- Sailor ( Will be used to sail to other islands ) -- Slayer Master ( Get slayer tasks & Slayer store ) -- Maker-over Mage ( Change how you appear ) -- Giant Rats ( Low level training ) -- Cows ( Low level training )
- Slayer Base -- Only task is Giant Rat currently. -- Shop has no items to purchase but ready to have them. -- Option to choose to teleport to one of our 3 slayer dungeons.
- Fishing Base -- You can now fish Shrimp & Sardines at Home. -- You can now fish Cod & Sharks at Home. [/spoiler][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520]
[I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a]Server Areas; [/COLOR][/B][/I][SIZE=1][COLOR=#a52a2a][URL=http://"http://uberlution.co.uk/forums/viewthread.php?forum=3&id=36"](Also click here)[/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE][I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][/B][/I] [COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520]These areas are the areas you will be able to travel and all areas will be packed up with content to enjoy. [spoiler] These are the places you will be able to travel too via the Sailor.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SVZn7rd.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4JqENwr.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2UKjSFv.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IVDl4Vr.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[/COLOR][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520][I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a]Media; [/COLOR][/B][COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][/I][COLOR=#a52a2a][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520][SIZE=1][COLOR=#a52a2a][URL=http://"http://uberlution.co.uk/forums/viewthread.php?forum=3&id=37"](Also click here) [img]http://i.imgur.com/HvULzoS.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lfyfryx.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zdmAzcS.png[/img][/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE][/COLOR][I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][/B][/I][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE] [/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE] [/CENTER]

item.title: Uberlution [PI Base]
item.dc:creator: @Uberlution Uberlution
item.description:
@Uberlution wrote:

[CENTER][B][SIZE=6][COLOR=#a52a2a]Uber[COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR]lution[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a]
About Uberlution;[/COLOR][/B][/I]
[COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520]Uberlution is a PI based server. At the moment the server is practically empty with just a little content around the home area. Uberlution plans on having a great economy, a superb community and plenty of fun content to enjoy! I decided to create Uberlution because I have always been interesting in learning to get deep into coding and own a community where everyone can enjoy a superb server and feel welcomed.[/COLOR] [SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520]The exp rates will be a little challenging, nothing what is going to take weeks of work to get a 99 though, the exp rate for combat is 10x RS, 40 exp per 1 damage.[/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a]Server Update Log;[/COLOR][/B][/I] [SIZE=1][URL=http://“http://uberlution.co.uk/forums/viewthread.php?forum=3&id=36”](Also click here)[/URL][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520][SIZE=2][spoiler]

  • Home Island created

  • Shops for home added;
    – Sigmunt the Merchant ( Island’s General Store )
    – Zeke: Melee Shop ( Low level Weapons & Armours )
    – Salesman: Range n Mage ( Low level Bows, Arrows, Runes and Robes )
    – Bob: Skilling Store ( General skilling supplies and low level herblore )
    – Points Merchant ( PvP store & Uber store )

  • NPC’s added for home;
    – Sailor ( Will be used to sail to other islands )
    – Slayer Master ( Get slayer tasks & Slayer store )
    – Maker-over Mage ( Change how you appear )
    – Giant Rats ( Low level training )
    – Cows ( Low level training )

  • Slayer Base
    – Only task is Giant Rat currently.
    – Shop has no items to purchase but ready to have them.
    – Option to choose to teleport to one of our 3 slayer dungeons.

  • Fishing Base
    – You can now fish Shrimp & Sardines at Home.
    – You can now fish Cod & Sharks at Home.
    [/spoiler][/SIZE][/COLOR][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520]

[I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a]Server Areas; [/COLOR][/B][/I][SIZE=1][COLOR=#a52a2a][URL=http://“http://uberlution.co.uk/forums/viewthread.php?forum=3&id=36”](Also click here)[/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE][I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][/B][/I]
[COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520]These areas are the areas you will be able to travel and all areas will be packed up with content to enjoy.
[spoiler]
These are the places you will be able to travel too via the Sailor.


[/spoiler]

[/COLOR][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520][/COLOR][/COLOR][/SIZE][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520][I][B][COLOR=#a52a2a]Media; [/COLOR][/B][COLOR=#a52a2a][/COLOR][/I][COLOR=#a52a2a][SIZE=2][COLOR=#a52a2a][COLOR=#daa520][SIZE=1][COLOR=#a52a2a][URL=http://“http://uberlution.co.uk/forums/viewthread.php?forum=3&id=37”](Also click here)
